message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.NI 

This paper belongs to the computer science sub-category of cybersecurity (cs.CR) as it deals with the problem of spam, which is a major security threat on the internet. It also involves the use of machine learning techniques such as genetic algorithms and naive Bayesian filters, which are commonly used in information retrieval (cs.IR), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and data science (cs.DS). Additionally, the simulation of email traffic falls under the sub-category of networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
